item.title: Lou Christie - Beyond The Blue Horizon
item.description:
Beyond the
blue horizon
Waits
a beautiful day
Goodbye to things
that bore me
Joy is
waiting for me
I see the
new horizon
My life
has only begun
Beyond the
blue horizon
Lies the
rising sun
